website_summaries.verdict: Though it provides some of the best motion control we've seen in games, a few issues and a lackluster launch library may have you waiting to buy the PlayStation Move.
pros: starter bundle includes everything needed to play HD motion control gaming
Sports Champions game offers a lot of replay value
cons: dependency on camera limits total movement
start and select buttons are oddly placed on Move controller
PlayStation Eye monopolizes a USB port

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Calibrate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set in the hopes of setting up the PS Move on my list of gaming options, but the thing didn't work. I've called PlayStation and done the online forums, but they are insistent that it is either my fault or the TV's fault. I have tried this on multiple TV sets and have had many of my friends who got theirs to work use it, but the controller just doesn't work. The other pieces and game works fine, though, but not being able to play it at home kind of defeats the purpose. calibrate
customer_reviews.author: Zil

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: So fun to play with this. It is easy to setup and use and doesn't take much to get used to. Gets me to exercise and spend some physical effort compared to normal PS3 games where you just sit there with a controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get into Move
customer_reviews.text: The PS Move set is very responsive almost on par with Nintendos Wii Motion Plus, not very often did I have trouble with it not doing what I wanted. However it does have some negatives like the camera not being of as good quality as i would like it to be, and the real big one lack of games to support it. As good as it is there just arent that many PS3 games that support move. Hopefully it'll get more support on PS4 with the PS4's Playstation Camera and VR Headset. For now though if you HAVE to have it its not a total waste as it works really well but I say wait a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Neely

customer_reviews.title: Great overall experience, unit is as described.  I'm very happy 😁 with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The item was in excellent condition and was received as described. It worked very well no problem, and charged up without an issue. I'm very happy 😁 with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fast shipping, fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a surprise for my boyfriend during quarantine since disc golf parks were closed and he loves it! Arrived sooner than expected and works great. We can use the one controller for two player gameplay as well. Even came with a lens cleaner included to maintain quality of the game disc. Very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Lot better than Wii
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with Move controllers from PS. I was going to buy the WII for a while for my kid, but been putting it off, and very happy with move. Initially it was little difficult to adjust to the controller, but once you figure it out it is great. I am not big into video games but This is fun to play with kids. I think the price is still little bit higher, and hopefully it will go down. Also you need atleast 2 or 3 controllers so that your family can play together, and whole think will cost you around $200-$250. I have used WII before but PS3 with move is much better graphics, and in HD.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the move controller didn't work, I am trying to reach the seller, if resolved, I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: MS BEE

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome bundle that really gets you started with playing motion ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bundle that really gets you started with playing motion controlled games on your PS3. The control using the move/camera combination is almost perfect (better than Wii that I have tried). The bundled game is a really nice introduction to what can be done the move controller. All the sports (with the exception of Archery for me) is fun and easy to jump into but have varying degrees of difficulty. Table tennis, volleyball and gladiator are really well implemented and you actually can start sweating if you really get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Obuone

customer_reviews.title: Where are all the GAMES???????
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in December of 2010 and i knew there weren't many games out but i just knew there would be by now.. Guess I was WRONG.. I mean yeah they have all the games like killzone 3, and a few other shooters with MOVE "Support" but I'm still waiting on Little Big Planet 2 to get the Move patch... And where's all the cool party games that every1 can play?? It's been months since i turned my little glowing balls on.. Kinda feel like I wasted $100+ since i bought several add ons..
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Love the Move!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get into the Move ecosystem. The whole family loves playing the Sports Champions game (have also purchased SC2 - best price was direct download from the Sony store). Time will tell on the staying power of the Move controller but my family has had a Wii for many years and are still playing it so I'm excited to get more Move games. Also, got this bundle used on amazon for a great price. It was in great condition. No manual or packaging but really, who need that?
customer_reviews.author: Miggy

customer_reviews.title: worth it just for the volleyball alone
customer_reviews.text: I think the PS3 move works better than the Wii. We have had our Wii since they first came out and we hardly ever play with it. We keep it in the back room for a netflix server on a seperate tv. The move camera works in our low light and sun back lit living room. I'm very happy. The old ps2 eye never worked right. I am having the most fun with the volleyball game. It's just great. I feel like i'm really playing. It's so much fun. I also ordered all the guns and they are meh. But for the volleyball i'm glad i have an extra controller.
customer_reviews.author: G. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bundle
customer_reviews.text: We have loved these controllers and had zero issue out of them. We use them moderately, so not heavy used. I find them to be accurate when you take the time to calibrate them before playing. My four year is also easily picked up by the camera so he can use them too. We also like the sport game that came with our bundle. We've played and enjoyed every game and do not find them overly difficult...or too easy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TA.D

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used.  Buy new.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying it used to save a little money. I regret it now. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned. If you're interested in this package, buy new. Avoid the pre-owned stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is separately wrapped - not in original packaging. The eye was in bubble wrap - no box. Could not even tell what it was until unwrapped. No directions for the eye or the move controller. I expected these to be "bundled" together with at least some basic instructions on how to hook it up to the PS3 and use them (which is why I bought a bundle). I'm not often disappointed by things I buy through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Caren S.

customer_reviews.title: Motion Bundle Rocks...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I bought a Playstation 3 form Amazon too but it was the Uncharted Bundle. I really wanted to have the motion controller with the eye and the game "Sports Champions". However, I was kind of short of money and I intended to purchase it used. Wow, it was in pristine conditions. It didn't come in the original box but I am very pleased. There are only few but very few scratches on the controller but it works wonderfully. The game is beautifully taken care of. No scratches at all. Good for the seller. Good for Amazon. Thanks guys....
customer_reviews.author: wankoken

customer_reviews.title: Adds nothing to the gaming experience.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back because it didn't work very well, but even when it did, it had a very limited "fun potential." Within a few minutes of setting this thing up, i realized that it wasn't going to ever be used. I pictured this as turning my PS3 into a Wii, but because the included multi sport game was really bad and because few if any of my other games worked with this controller, it had little promise. There is a reason that there isn't a PS4 equivalent, and I would urge Sony not to attempt this sort of gimmick again.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Truly accurate and incredible experience
customer_reviews.text: This motion control add on was a great idea by Sony. This definitely competes well with the kinect. It is much more accurate and way more fun on some sports games because it is so accurate. This is a very inexpensive product that will give you hours of fun with the family. The games feel so real on this. The including sports champions game demonstrates the move's potential very nicely. Overall a great product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Big time Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: The move system adds yet another amazing dimension to the already incredible PS3 system. The sports champions bundle is a great starting point, comes with everything you need. The sports champions game is really cool, great fun games and the motion tracking is spot on with virtually no lag. Great value, great fun, amazing accuracy. Just get it. P.S. Ignore all the people rating this as 1 star, they clearly have never used this.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad game by any means but a pale competitor to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad game by any means but a pale competitor to Wii Sports. Thankfully the move controllers can be used on PS4 with PSVR giving them much more life and play time than they had on my PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pisko

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack on release day with various other 'move' gear. SO MUCH FUN!!! Observing the precision with which the PS3 recognizes movement in a 3d environment and exactly maps the data into the game inspired my next idea, integration with a nice 3d 1080p Projector, the VPL-VW90ES 3D Projector, which Sony will release in November. This system is a must have for any media enthusiast. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: A M Marcus

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas and we have had so much fun playing this game together! Our three year old daughter has tried to play with us the only complication is that she has to stand on the couch to be in view of the playstation eye which as you can imagine is somewhat dangerous so we give her a controller but she isn't actually playing with us. Wish there was a way she could play safely with us as well. But other than that we really enjoy this and feel it was a great purchase that we would certainly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carr

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, Check it Out with Your Own Two Eyes
customer_reviews.text: Playstation Move is a solid product, especially if you're interested in playing Wii-style games on your PS3. If you have a Wii then this product isn't anything groundbreaking, but it's fairly well done. Check out my video review to see exactly what you get in this bundle, how this product is setup on your TV, and then even a bit of Sports Champions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This was gifted to a friend and her kids loved it
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great bundle.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great bundle that gets you everything you need to start getting full PS Move use out of the PS3. I only wish an alternate bundle existed with two move controllers so that I didn't have to buy a 2nd wand separately at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Product as described. 👍🏻 will buy in future. Easy transections. Quick delivery. Fair price. Aaa. Aaa. Aaa. Aaa
customer_reviews.author: Jayadeepsinh

customer_reviews.title: Moving up.
customer_reviews.text: The Playstation Move is absolutely essential for the PS3. It is just as accurate as Sony claims, and while I only use it for a hand full of games, it's totally worth purchasing. I really hope to see more games in the future that take advantage of it. The potential is astounding. I'm getting a second one for duel wielding!!
customer_reviews.author: demonsRendangered

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little more effort in gaming than my child was willing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ryu

customer_reviews.title: So Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game and game system. It is so funky, the only thing is is that you must have enough room to swing in. It registers you with the camera so that way it changes it for all different sized people. I am really addicted to the ping pong table game. I love this system and I can't wait for more games to come out with the compatibility to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: NOT for PSVR!
customer_reviews.text: Word of warning, anyone wanting to buy this as a workaround for the PSVR camera and controller: you can't. This is designed for PS Move for the PS3, and while the hardware may work on your PS4, you won't get the experience you're hoping for if trying to pair it with the VR.
customer_reviews.author: Mychyl

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!  Love it!  WAY better than Kinect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the PS Move bundle because I wanted to actually have controllers I could hold in my hand; I didn't want to be just waving my empty hands around in the air (a la XBOX). The technology is awesome...I played Ping Pong for a while and it's a blast; now I'm downloading a whole bunch of Move-enabled game Demo's from the Playstation Network to see what else is out there for this great technology. Sony's got a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Neesley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest possible way to get a move controller for the PS4. Lovin' it.
customer_reviews.author: Micah H.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: this product does everything is said it would in the advertisement, it was packaged well and arrived quickly. this product will be very useful and I am very happy with the purchase. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: darin

customer_reviews.title: Not Kinect, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have a great time whenever I play with the Move and my father. He's a sore loser and pushes me out of the camera's area during the gladiator's fights, but it's always very entertaining. Kinect is way better, but Move got its charms as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lott

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about it, Then get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love! A lot of reasons why we stay at home and can still get things done with technology. The move helps us have fun Great for a small gathering of friends and helps us all ages stay active. :)
customer_reviews.author: Story Teller

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Accessories!
customer_reviews.text: First off i like to say i was cautious while i bought this as i am not so big on motion controllers. i just dont know what so special about them that makes people go crazy saying its the future. Even with this i have to say its no different than playing the Wii. It has its fair share of good games (i have the game it comes with this bundle, Little Big Planet, and EyePet that works with these accessories) and i would say if you can find it cheap get it, although its nothing really special!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed the move controller and the game did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed the move controller and the game did not work at all we even tried charging the controller and it would not charge we even tried a new charger cord and that did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy l johnson

customer_reviews.title: They sent wrong camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: They sent my daughter... for Christmas... PS3 game, PS3 move controller, BUT a PS2 eye toy camera!!!!!! The camera is not compatible!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MarRhu

customer_reviews.title: great kit!
customer_reviews.text: fun fun fun for the winter months! im very pleased with this purchase to upgrade our little big planet experience! we ordered another motion controller separately and have had a great amount of enjoyment with this new addition to our PS3 system.
customer_reviews.author: ampm247

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to set up. Easy to calibrate. Use it on my ps3.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good value here. Built in battery seems to hold charge well and unit(s) work well. It is hard to get used to when you first switch over. The game is very fun to play and watch others play. Just make sure you have room around you.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Van Order

customer_reviews.title: Good package
customer_reviews.text: This is a good package to buy. Came on time. Easy to set up. Good game, real move controller and camera fun to use still use it to this day on my ps3 for sports champions and sports champions 2. The mic is very good on the camera and takes good pictures. Worth the buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Nice games, active and cool. Everything worked and still works fine. Received it in a box with a little dust on it. Used item, its ok as long as it functions properly which it does.
customer_reviews.author: Romanista

customer_reviews.title: Playstation Move Starter Bundle is a good start.
customer_reviews.text: On the good side, it comes with a Move-playable game. On the down-side, no nav controller. But I DID get everything I needed to get started with the Move capability. Unfortunately, it doesn't work with Call of Duty series games. That's my own fault, though. I expected a FPS game to work with it. I recommend, though.
customer_reviews.author: V. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that it is not very kid-friendly. (Durability, Game-Style etc..) But for a hardcore gamer, It is truly what you have been waiting for. It is much more advanced than the Wii and therefore closer to true virtual reality. Not only is PlayStation releasing games like this that were made for the Move, but they are patching games such as Heavy Rain to incorporate it. An excellent investment in your gaming future.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: The response time on this version was so bad, I ended up putting it in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: The response time on this version was so bad, I ended up putting it in the box and selling it a month later.To be fair they may have improved it since I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: malewizard

customer_reviews.title: Cant put it down
customer_reviews.text: Wow I have played Wii before and I will never play it again. My arm is sore I love being able to get close to the net and slam the ping pong ball. Controllers are a little expensive but worth it. Cant wait for a good shooter game to come out and being able to play sports with someone whos not a bobble headed freak. Good luck Kinect you will need it. P.S for people who watch the videos and think you have to have 2 controller for archery, sword game, etc... they make it so you can use one also but it a little nicer having 2 but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: THE EYE AND THE GAME ARE OK BUT THE MOVE IS BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: THE EYE WORKS WELL BUT THE MOVE DOESN'T CHARGE, IT IS BROKEN OR THERE IS ANYTHING I SHOULD DO FOR IT TO CHARGE? HELP PLEASE
customer_reviews.author: Nadia C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I smacked an opponet with what looked like a huge sledge hammer and also played table tennis for the first time in my life. Dont be fooled though its just as intense as playing for real and quickly worked up a sweat. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Luvbird

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB!!! AMAZING MOVES!!
customer_reviews.text: JUST WANT TO SAY THE PING PONG GAME ARE AWESOME ITS LIKE PLAY IN PERSON,THE KILLING...IS BLASTING YOU CAN KILL LIKE A PRO YOU FEEL YOU'RE PLAYING IN FROM OF THE TABLE...JUST AMAZING 5+ FOR THIS TECHNOLOGY!!! THE ARCHERY.....WOW MAN!!THANKS SONY
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: and in excellent condition, very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: in line with expectations and offered , arrived at the date indicated , and in excellent condition , very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Julian F. Marmolejo

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Although my wife was not interested in Move before I bought this, she now loves playing it. Frisbee golf and the gladiator game are her favorites. The move controller works very well with Sports Champions and several of the games provide a nice workout while playing. Others, like bocce ball, are nice and relaxing. Be sure to get a second motion controller if you can find one. The navigation controller is not really necessary for many of the games out currently.
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this game like others who buy, are very good, worth a great rate, I liked everything about this product, I recommend it to anyone who is immersed in the world of games .... I recommend
customer_reviews.author: pedro8929

customer_reviews.title: It's like a better Wii in HD
customer_reviews.text: I was rather skeptical about the move but I was wrong. It really is a lot of fun and unlike the Wii and the Kinect it is true 1:1 movement. Well worth the money and it is extremely fun!
customer_reviews.author: Facelift13

customer_reviews.title: Don't look at is like a wii
customer_reviews.text: The idea of the PS Move is interesting, but that ball on the controller is horrible, the games that have come out for this aren't even ok, and the look and feel of the move is just "meh"
customer_reviews.author: Razgank

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology
customer_reviews.text: no real lag...well very little...the warrior fightings kinda kewl...and the boxing...but motion controllers are still at this point a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Stabicus

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: works as well as Kinect imo.. meaning sometimes not too good.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I Wanted/Needed.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first thing I looked for when starting the Move. Sports Champions is great, with Bocce Ball and the Disc Golf is incredible, so much better than the Wii. I highly recommend it, and advise getting a second Move controller.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: perfect starter kit for ps3 move
customer_reviews.text: great item, and great price. Perfect for starter kit for playstation move. All the games are very sensitive to the controller, unlike the wii system which has a lot of difficulty detecting motion
customer_reviews.author: Trrampage

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: I love the game but the eye didnt work and the controller rarely works. I bought a new controller and eye and it now works fine. So the 3 star was for the game and the eye and controller 1 star
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Super fan...who said PS3 means just sitting on the couch and play?
customer_reviews.text: Very fun hardware to add to your PS3, very precise, i would say more precise than Wii in regards to movement detection. It adds a lot of realism to the games, and also allows you to do do some exercise while paying. It comes with a few games included like beach volley, however it works perfect in other games like Killzone 3. definitely a good investment, you get lots of fun for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marco F.

customer_reviews.title: holodeck is next
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love it sports champions is amazing the gladiator is by far my favorite got it on release 10 hours of gladiator duels and my arms are worked and rubbery archery ping pong frolf and bocce ball are all really fun the volleyball was kinda gay but volleyball is kinda gay to begin with the motion controls are amazing it is quite accurate it makes the wii look like a joke to me i just cant wait to play more fun new games thanks sony!@
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fun game the whole family enjoys it as much exercise shares this game
customer_reviews.author: JOSE MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Move is great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the Move, which works great. The game is for older kids, my grandson is 5 and it's to hard for him to play.
customer_reviews.author: Judi S.

customer_reviews.title: >I am happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I am having a lot of fun with this bundle, I get exercise and its neat seeing that you are putting an effort into these games. Better then sitting on your ass fiddling with your fingers
customer_reviews.author: the one

customer_reviews.title: Sports anyone ?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal to get your move experience started. Great sports game. I also recommend a second move controller. This is the only way to go if you dont have any move controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, delivered on time, you will have lots of fun with family and friends, do not expect a highdefinition camera but I does what's promised, it has an accurate movement detection, good price. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Norwin

customer_reviews.title: Workout Essentials
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starter kit for the PS3. Gives you a nice mini workout. Bundle gives you an idea of what type of games you would most likely enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Île Garçon

customer_reviews.title: Move over Wii (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: The Move is a great piece of technology and Sports Champion is a fun game. I am excited for the posibities and already bought Singstar Dance and will purchase a stand alone Move controller and The Fight. Setting up the Move and the Eye is a breeze and the tracking is unbelievable. I have played with a Wii and the Move is head and shoulders above it. I am very happy with my purchase and I have to say that motion gaming, done correctly, is a lot of fun. The PS3 will be helped a lot by the release of Move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Add-on to the Playstation
customer_reviews.text: Very fun add-on to the playstation! Opens up great new features of some games we already own. Gets everyone at a party involved and having a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brellenthin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this product! Everything is in working order and I can now play my move games. The game that came with the product is a lot of fun. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Move Bundle
customer_reviews.text: I love this move bundle. Everything is working great and i have had no problems with this product whatsoever. I would definetely recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shane37

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A great controller, just what you expected from what you can see in the pictures, worth the money for the good quality
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of fun....
customer_reviews.text: I think this is better than the WII, I'm so happy I bought the move package. Getting 2 move controllers and 1 navigation control is what I would recommend. It's so much fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jabbar

customer_reviews.title: it is alot of fun for gamers who don't like to just sit there ...
customer_reviews.text: it is alot of fun for gamers who don't like to just sit there and play but like to relay get into it
customer_reviews.author: james e g helberg

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this was a perfect purchase from a perfect seller. I bought it as a gift for christmas last year and am pleased to say it still works just fine. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lindalou889

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked as said! I use it for exercise so it works pretty darn good camera is wanting though kind of broken images.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Martinez

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: This game with the controller delivers nothing but entertainment. With games like Archery and Gladiator, it's just fun all the way. This is hands down better than the wii. It just does not even come close. The controller changes colors depending on the game and it vibrates just like any PlayStation controller. It is smooth and responsive with no lag. I can see PlayStation coming out with some great games in the future. This is a great buy no matter what age.
customer_reviews.author: Inphantry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: For my almost 5 years daughter this is a amazing bundle, she loves playing with this game and the just dance game, and for the price with a almost free game I do recommend this bundle, then you can buy your extra Move games!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Godreau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit, easy to set up and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for one of our children. The only negative comment I can make is that I don't get to watch the TV as much in the family room.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of fun with this! It's a lot of fun..just wish it came with 2 controllers rather than one. But it's a great value and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shiner

customer_reviews.title: Got this item as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this item as a gift, the recipient seemed to really like it and recommended it to others. . .
customer_reviews.author: Joshy G

customer_reviews.title: Technology
customer_reviews.text: Performed as advertised. it provided fun for the whole family. If you want to do more than sit in front of the PS3 buy them.
customer_reviews.author: David Madej

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle great game great controller. This pulls me out of the gym and it's really exhaust you playing Gladiator in the bundle, tough Sport Champions 2 still looks more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Great sonny product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get the ps3 eye experience. No complaints. Great sonny product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Felipe

customer_reviews.title: doesn't worth it at all, it was clearly a ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't worth it at all, it was clearly a quick reaction to the wii controller but it is not even near to it's performance (and I'm not a fan of the Wiii, not at all...)
customer_reviews.author: Pablo M.

customer_reviews.title: Romila Sinha
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all PS3 users. This is really a starter bundle for me. The Move controller is just amazing & it comes with a 6-1 game DVD with very interesting games in it. It gives you multi player option in almost all of them so it's fun to play with friends & family. I wanted to buy XBOX initially mainly because of the Kinect feature but now I feel this one's better as the controller acts as a simulator in the games & is more fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Romila

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one quickly
customer_reviews.text: After a boring GunCom of the Time Crisis 4 i was skeptic with this one but after playing for half hour I run to closest store and by another PSMove for play all sports in this game, realy Sony's made this device better than any other in market and i risk to say best than was made by Nintendo or Microsoft...
customer_reviews.author: Silva

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: No different from the wii only harder to use. I would pass on it now that I know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: jsy

customer_reviews.title: fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: love this game.... enjoyed playing with my friends... good for exercise while having fun.... also bought lights out with it... keeps your adrenaline high...
customer_reviews.author: lou lou

customer_reviews.title: PlayStation Move Starter Bundle
customer_reviews.text: The item is totally smooth to use. Graphics respond easily to signals and the fact that it is wireless is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: sebabs32

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun system to play with especially with the sports champions game.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It has got everything.
customer_reviews.text: Everything as promised, good buy. The only problem I faced is while fixing the camera on my TV. It does not have proper support to fix it. We need to but additional holder to fix the camera.
customer_reviews.author: srikanthraj

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and Active.
customer_reviews.text: Very active when you play with other people. Takes real coordination. Love the Archery, and Disc Golf.
customer_reviews.author: Rab Marr

customer_reviews.title: one of the best motion controllers in the market but sadly no much ...
customer_reviews.text: one of the best motion controllers in the market but sadly no much support from the developer community. any way, if found cheap is a great add on to your PS3 collection as some of the best selling games for the console added Playstation Move support (Killzone 3, Resistance 3, RE5, Heavy Rain, etc...). the reaction time is 1 to 1 so yes is way more precise than the kinect (I own a X360 with Kinect) so if looking for something to expand some what the life of your PS3 give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Silva (MajinGunplero)

customer_reviews.title: nice starter pack
customer_reviews.text: I was really curious about the ps move, having a control and a game in the same pack is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Troya

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun Fun Fun! Similar to the Wii. More live with the people and scenery. Would recommend to whoever wants to interact
customer_reviews.author: Mishka2004

customer_reviews.title: Playstation
customer_reviews.text: A great starter pack at a great price. It's cheaper to buy the bundle than to buy it separately as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Derek L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Wii. Eat your heart out
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet. SUPER FUN. Realisic hi res vs Wii low res cartoon world. Im 40. I love it. Will be picking up a second wand. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product. More realistic than the wii I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent Product. More realistic than the wii I need to find if the lag is from the game or the move concept.
customer_reviews.author: K.hodges

product_meta.title: PlayStation Move Starter Bundle
feature_bullets: Bundle hardware is compatible optional hardware, sold separately, including additional Move motion controllers
Affordable starter bundle for the Sony's motion-controlled gaming system, PlayStation Move
Includes the PlayStation Move components, the PlayStation Move motion controller and PlayStation Eye camera peripheral
The PlayStation Move motion controller features standard PlayStation navigational button for easy in-game movement
Includes a copy of the Multiplayer PlayStation Move game, Sports Champions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars668 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
